page.title: 05Housing
page.content: We asked people whether their house was owned,rented or was tied to their job. Of those that replied 69% owned their house, 23% lived in tied houses and 8% rent their house. 67% of houses are built of natural stone and are quite old, 18% are built of re-constituted stone and are fairly modern and 15% are built of other materials. 69% live in detached houses and the rest in semi-detached. There are no terrace houses in the area. 62% have central heating fuelled by either electricity or solid fuel, 36% just have open fires and 1 person heats their house by Calor Gas.
